head.title: A Field Trip Veteran Adds Some Pointers

meta.name: online_sections

hedline.hl1: A Field Trip Veteran Adds Some Pointers

abstract.p: Music teacher Gail Audrey Schwartz letter on April 30 article offers her own insights into elementary school field trips (S)

block.p: Field trips for elementary school students are designed to enhance the curriculum. We take our kids to the symphony, museums and eduction sites like Waterloo Village. In today's world, the parents are simply too busy to take their own children for these enriching experiences. It's really a shame that your newspaper chooses to ricidule this worthwhile activity.
The writer is a music teacher in the Dumont Public Schools
